class.name: ModifierBoneTarget3D
class.brief_description: –ê node that dynamically copies the 3D transform of a bone in its parent [Skeleton3D].
class.description: This node selects a bone in a [Skeleton3D] and attaches to it. This means that the [ModifierBoneTarget3D] node will dynamically copy the 3D transform of the selected bone. The functionality is similar to [BoneAttachment3D], but this node adopts the [SkeletonModifier3D] cycle and is intended to be used as another [SkeletonModifier3D]'s target.

members.member: The index of the attached bone.
The name of the attached bone.
